concept.definition: The cancer is a new primary cancer.
The cancer is a regional (local) recurrence.
The cancer is a distant metastases.

description: Lists the options for recording the a new primary cancer or a residual cancer, if known.
name: NewCancerOrRecurrence

text.div:
NewCancerOrRecurrence

Lists the options for recording the a new primary cancer or a residual cancer, if known.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-new-cancer-or-recurrence defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
new-primary New primaryThe cancer is a new primary cancer.
regional_recurrence Regional (local) recurrenceThe cancer is a regional (local) recurrence.
distant_metastases Distant metastasesThe cancer is a distant metastases.
indeterminate IndeterminateThe cancer is indeterminate.
